content.text: Welcome to Ahrilang. This is a tutorial for using Ahrilang. Just press 'Try' to see the result.
Variables can be used to store values.

a = 1
print(a)
b = "hello"
print(b)
c = true
print(c)
Functions are used to perform specific tasks.
Async functions are used to perform tasks asynchronously.
If statements are used to perform different tasks based on certain conditions.
Loops are used to repeat tasks.
While loops are used to repeat tasks while a condition is true.
